member.name: M:DeviceConnectorSample.Controllers.DeviceController.TelemetryDataPollTrigger(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Trigger operation for collecting of telemetry data.
member.param: mock if you do not have Service Bus connection string. Anything else will collect telemetry data from service bus.
Service Bus connection string. Used only if triggerState not equql 'mock'.
The path of the queue where telemetry data are stored.
